summary: Jericho is an ancient city in the West Bank, Palestine. It's one of the oldest cities globally, with a history dating back 11,000 years. The city is situated in the Jordan Valley and was known in biblical times as the "city of palm trees." Jericho has been ruled by various powers, including Jordan and Israel, and is now under the administration of the Palestinian Authority. In 2023, its archaeological site, Tell es-Sultan, became a UNESCO World Heritage Site, recognized as the world's oldest fortified city.
title: Jericho
